pr_title: Guard against regex and range expansion by default

timeline.message:
Guard against regex and range expansion by default

The DefaultQueryPlanner will attempt to expand regex and bounded ranges
by default, even when no regex nodes exist in the query.

Add a visitor to count each type of node in a query, and use this to
only expand the query when the relevant nodes are present.

Fixes #888

timeline.bodyText: Given #926 has been merged in, we can now detect bounded ranges precisely.  Update the node counter to also count the different types of QueryPropertyMarkers.  This can then be if (nodeCount.asBoundedRange()).
